summary: I HAVE A 1999 F150 FORD TRUCK.  LARGE OIL LEAK FROM THE RIGHT HAND HEAD GASKET AT THE REAR OF THE BLOCK ON MY ENGINE.  ALSO A LEAK ON OUTSIDE RIGHT HAND FILLING INTAKE VALLEY.   ESTIMATED COST FROM FORD DEALERSHIP $1600 DEPENDING ON WHAT IT TAKES TO REPAIR IT.   I FEEL THIS IS A MAJOR REPAIR AND POSSIBLY THE PART WAS POORLY MACHINED.  *JB
